mapper.insert: insert into school (id, objectid, name, address, region, edu_type, account_type, email, linkman, linkway, start_date, end_date, property, has_sub, sub_list, has_office, office, center ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{objectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edu_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{property,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{has_sub,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sub_list,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{has_office,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{office,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{center,jdbcType=VARBINARY} )
mapper.update: update school set objectid = #{objectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edu_type = #{edu_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_type = #{account_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkway = #{linkway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, property = #{property,jdbcType=INTEGER}, has_sub = #{has_sub,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_list = #{sub_list,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_office = #{has_office,jdbcType=INTEGER}, office = #{office,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, center = #{center,jdbcType=VARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, objectid, name, address, region, edu_type, account_type, email, linkman, linkway, start_date, end_date, property, has_sub, sub_list, has_office, office, center from school where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, objectid, name, address, region, edu_type, account_type, email, linkman, linkway, start_date, end_date, property, has_sub, sub_list, has_office, office, center from school
